alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 10:47PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Scattered Snow Showers Expected Monday... Scattered to numerous snow showers are expected to develop Monday as a strong cold front works across the region. In addition to the snow showers, strong gusty northwest winds of 20-30 mph are expected. Some of the snow showers may be briefly heavy resulting in reduced visibilities and some minor accumulations on grassy surfaces. Air temperatures during the day are expected to remain above freezing, though temperatures are expected to drop below freezing towards sunset. Those traveling across portions of central Kentucky Monday should monitor the latest forecasts and be prepared for rapidly changing weather and travel conditions. Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio and your local media for the latest updates.
